common_navigation_structure: Logo + Home + Diensten + Projecten + Over Ons + Contact
menu_strategy: Service categories (Werktuigbouw, Elektrotechniek, etc.). Often technical but should focus on client benefits.
booking_strategy: Offerte aanvraag form (primary). Phone secondary. For maintenance: service contracts.
pricing_strategy: Almost never on website. 'Vraag offerte aan' is standard. Some show indicatief for common services.
gallery_usage: Project photos important. Before/after renovation shots. Client facility photos.
research_notes: Partial research. Analyzed dejong.nl (large corporate - not target). Need 8+ more SMB installatiebedrijven.

example_sites.name: A. de Jong Installatietechniek
example_sites.observations: Not target market - too large. Good reference for Pro tier features.

pro_tier.required_sections: All Groei + client portal, maintenance contracts, case studies
